desc:19703999: Focus intently on trying to detect certain creatures.

desc:2153503111: Greatly increased chance to detect traps.
desc:1284713294:

Fazed enemies take {3}% more damage from you and cannot parry your attacks.

desc:1905580018: Slice and Dice grants {1}% additional attack speed and gives your auto-attacks a chance to refresh your opportunity to strike with Unseen Blade.
desc:300805870: Each time you consume a stack of Deathstalker's Mark, reduce the cooldown of Shadowstep by {1} sec.

Pick Pocket and Sap have {2} yd increased range.

desc:4149478522: Feint reduces damage taken from area-of-effect attacks by an additional {1}%
desc:3588596977:
Garrote applies {1} stacks of Deathstalker's Mark to your target, unless Deathstalker's Mark is already active.

When you spend {2} or more combo points on attacks against a Marked target you consume an application of Deathstalker's Mark, dealing {3} Plague damage.

desc:2362293089: Cloak of Shadows duration increased by {1} sec.
desc:4047463355:
Flip a Fatebound Coin each time a finishing move consumes {1} or more combo points. Heads increases the damage of your attacks by {2}%, lasting {3} sec or until you flip Tails. Tails deals {4} Cosmic damage to your target.

For each time the same face is flipped in a row, Heads increases damage by an additional {5}% and Tails increases its damage by {6}%.
desc:2491077497: Blade Flurry damage is increased by {1}% while Flawless Form is active.
desc:555721390: Fan of Knives damage increased by {1}%.

desc:1618996054: Switch out your smoke for a Flash Bang!

desc:3475418140: Activating Deathmark flips a Fatebound Coin and causes it to land on its edge, counting as both Heads and Tails.
